history.narrative: Law 6-24, the “Tax Conformity Amendment Act of 1985,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-172, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 14, 1985 and May 28, 1985, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 10, 1985, it was assigned Act No. 6-39 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
